pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī (sikkhamānāya…pe… sāmaṇeriyā…pe… ) gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
